name: Shoot That Pizza (wstacey)
description:
Created in 48 hours, Shoot That Pizza is a late arrival to Wizard Jam 2016. This submission will surely change the way you think about shooting pizza.

Packed with action and adventure, Shoot That Pizza will truly make you exclaim "Стрелять эту пиццу"!

  • Hours of entertainment
  • Infinitely replayable
  • Pizzas!
  • Guns!
